Description: Sculpture of a seated Egyptian scribe in a glass case in the British Museum, directed to right, and another Egyptian sculpture in a taller case behind. 1913 Drypoint
Producer name: Print made by: James Hamilton Hay
Curator's comments: See 1949,0411.346 for head and shoulders of the same sculpture.
Bibliographic references: Marriott 1927 / Drypoints of J. Hamilton Hay (17)
